TriviaQuestion.QuestionText: From which movie came the line, 'Have you ever talked to a corpse? It's boring...'
TriviaQuestion.AnswerTextB: B) A Nightmare on Elm Street
TriviaQuestion.AnswerTextD: D) I Know What You Did Last Summer

TriviaQuestion.QuestionText: From which movie came the line, 'THE POWER OF CHRIST COMPELS YOU!'
From which movie came the line, 'They mostly come out at night, mostly...'?
Which movie is accredited with being the first horror film in the world?
TriviaQuestion.AnswerTextB: B) Night of the Living Dead

TriviaQuestion.QuestionText: Which was the first monster to appear in a full length horror film?
In which of the following movies does a child get possessed by the Devil?
TriviaQuestion.AnswerTextC: C) The Last House on the Left

TriviaQuestion.QuestionText: Which of the following is not a Rob Zombie directed horror movie?
TriviaQuestion.AnswerTextD: D) The House of El Superbeasto

TriviaQuestion.QuestionText: Which horror movie, shot only within 8 days, became one of the highest horror movie grossers of all times?
Which horror movie was banned in several places as it showed a killer Santa Claus?
Which horror movie had the cult line, 'I'm having an old friend for dinner'?
